alert.note: Alert for East Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco Bay Shoreline (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 10:55PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Contra Costa County through 1130 PM PST... At 1055 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pinole, or near San Pablo, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Concord, Richmond, Martinez, Pleasant Hill, San Pablo, El Cerrito, Hercules, Pinole, Port Costa, Tara Hills, Rodeo, Rollingwood, El Sobrante, Kensington, Pacheco, East Richmond Heights, Vine Hill, Bayview-Montalvin, East Richmond Heigts and Crockett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco Bay Shoreline
